com.aurel.track.dao.torque

Class SimpleCriteria

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      • java.util.Hashtable
        • org.apache.torque.util.Criteria
          • com.aurel.track.dao.torque.SimpleCriteria
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map

    public class SimpleCriteria
extends org.apache.torque.util.Criteria
    Adds some useful features to Torques default criteria class:
  • Copy Constructor
  • Overwritten clone method
  • Handling of some custom criteria, eg. isNull
See Also:
